/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on statutory bars to benefits, including
bars established by 38 CFR 3.12(c)
discharge or dismissal
by the sentence of a general court-martial (GCM)
discharges for alienage
, and
discharges for unauthorized absence (UA) or AWOL
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A  - Character of Discharge (COD) and Bars to Benefits
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A
